item.title: Silicone Dishwashing Gloves
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Material: 100% food grade silicone Color: purple, blue, pink, green, gray, rose red, yellow Size: 13 * 24cm Uses: washing dishes and vegetables
item.content:encoded:
Thickened food-grade materials, different brushes and uneven surfaces can be used in combination with different use scenarios. Hanging design, easy to dry after cleaning, clean and healthy, not easy to breed bacteria. Dishwashing gloves have good elasticity and self-recovery and can be used for a long time.

How to choose dishwashing gloves?

  1. Pick according to comfort.

Many women use dishwashing gloves for dishwashing or hygiene. The frequency of use is high, so the comfort of the hand is very important. When choosing the dishwashing gloves, choose some dishwashing gloves that match the hand curve design. Dishwashing gloves are as flexible as your second layer of skin, making them more comfortable to use and making housework easier.

 

  1. Pick according to the design.

In addition to finger and palm parts, high-quality dishwashing gloves have anti-slip granules. The whole palm is non-slip, making things difficult to slip off. There is also a velvet design, which can keep warm and keep warm, and has a good affinity for the skin, even if it is cold. In winter, you can also take care of your hands in all directions, not afraid of being attacked by detergents. Inferior dishwashing gloves can’t do this. Inferior dishwashing gloves are often cold, hard and poorly insulated. They can be used in winter to feel basically no heat preservation effect. They have been used in washing detergents or after summer and environmental changes. Corrosion aging, short service life.

 

  1. Choose according to quality.

Dishwashing gloves are basically used regularly, so choose some non-stick fingers, hand-applied, light-duty dishwashing gloves are more practical, more convenient to wear and take off. High-quality dishwashing gloves can be repeatedly cleaned, repeatedly dried and not shed, no dandruff, no odor, safer and more durable. Ordinary dishwashing gloves are generally sticky, easy to fall off after washing, no sticking, clumsy operation, inconvenient to wear, and some with rubber odor.

item.title: Plus Velvet Warm Waterproof Dishwashing Gloves
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Material: PVC + beef tendon cloth Weight: 124g Size: 50cm Color: pink, blue, green The anti-slip texture design makes the grip firm and the items are not easy to fall off. The beam is designed to prevent it from falling off during use. Plus velvet design, soft and skin-friendly. Hangable design for easy drying.

item.description: Material: PVC Color: white, black, gray Size: S/M/L Length: 30cm The material is thick, tough and durable. Elastic rolled cuffs prevent falling off. The design of the whole palm anti-skid texture, the cleaning things are not easy to slip, and the grip is more stable.

item.title: Kitchen Cleaning Rubber Thickening Gloves
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Material: PVC Color: blue, white, pink Weight: single layer 57g, plus velvet 75g Glove length: 31cm Uses: cleaning
item.content:encoded:
High quality material, good water repellency, oil resistance and corrosion resistance. Full palm texture, items are not easy to slip. Gloves can be cleaned in the kitchen and decontaminated to remove oil. Wash the bathroom, isolate the stains, and not hurt your hands.

item.title: Household Cleaning Laundry Washing Gloves
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
PVC material, no peculiar smell, non-toxic, non-corrosive, no spoilage and adhesion, and will not be oxidized at room temperature. The fingertips are thickened to strengthen the protection. item.title: Fashion Copy And Velvet Warm Dishwashing Gloves
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Material: PVC Glove length: 48cm Color: blue, green, purple, pink Uses: dishwashing, housekeeping, etc.
item.content:encoded:
The honeycomb siphon point design greatly enhances the surface friction, the adsorption force, the grip safety, and effectively prevents slippage. The user-friendly elastic flexible cuffs are designed to fit tightly and tightly to prevent the cuffs from rewinding and damping the clothes.
